plot outline: Sharabha movie is a Socio-Fantasy and Action Thriller directed by N Narasimha Rao and produced by Ashwani Kumar Sehdev while Koti scored music for this movie. Aakash Kumar and Mishti are in the main lead roles along with Jaya Prada, Napoleon, Puneet Issar, Charandeep, L B Sriram, Avinash, Tanikella Bharani are seen in supporting roles in this movie. It is an Epic Fight between Good and Evil - God and Devil.
